byline.contributor: John Eligon reported from St. Louis, and Monica Davey from Chicago.
byline.original: By JOHN ELIGON and MONICA DAVEY

abstract: St Louis fire officials say they suspect series of six arsons at black churches are connected; investigation is ongoing.
lead_paragraph: The fires have occurred at churches with mostly black memberships and in mostly black neighborhoods, but the authorities said they did not know whether race played a role.

headline.main: St. Louis Officials Believe Arsons at 6 Black Churches Are Linked
headline.print_headline: Officials in St. Louis Believe That Recent Fires at Six Black Churches Are Related

snippet: The fires have occurred at churches with mostly black memberships and in mostly black neighborhoods, but the authorities said they did not know whether race played a role.
